name: Chameleon Run Deluxe Edition
detailed_description:
Fast and Challenging


Chameleon Run is a unique, fast and challenging autorunner with a colorful twist. Jump, switch and run through expertly crafted levels that will have you running back for more.

Your goal is to switch your color to match the ground as you run and jump from platform to platform. Sounds easy right? Well think again!
about_the_game:
Fast and Challenging


Chameleon Run is a unique, fast and challenging autorunner with a colorful twist. Jump, switch and run through expertly crafted levels that will have you running back for more.

short_description: Chameleon Run is a unique, fast and challenging autorunner with a colorful twist. Jump, switch and run through expertly crafted levels that will have you running back for more.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7-3770, AMD FX 8350 4.0 Ghz
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM
